prompt: Cartoon style animation. A small 7-year-old boy named Golu with a round face, big expressive brown eyes, and messy short black hair, wearing a simple bright yellow t-shirt and blue shorts. He is happily kneeling in a lush, green Indian village, planting a tiny green sapling in the soil. The background shows quaint huts and flowering bushes under a bright blue sky. Warm and cheerful lighting.
